Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory309.png'}
{3: 'As time passes on, the vendors begin to pick up shop. However, the market is still full of people who are now exchanging gifts they had prepared for their sweethearts.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'These gifts may be for confessions of love...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Or gratitude for long-lasting friendship...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Or simply just a thank you for daily help...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, can people who aren't romantically involved exchange gifts on White Day?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia asks you, perhaps because the scene before her seems to be different than what she was told when she first came here.'}
{2: 'Long ago, maybe not. But now...', 3: '18'}
{3: 'They are just using the holiday as a chance to express their gratitude, even though they could do that normally...'}
{2: 'But special days will give different meanings to the same actions.', 3: '20'}
{3: 'Hearing this, Lucia looks at the happy face of a man.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's a pity I didn't prepare a gift for you and everyone else.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives a sigh of regret.'}
{2: "It's not too late. Some vendors haven't packed up yet.", 3: '25'}
{2: 'You still have a chance to choose gifts.', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Shouldn't gifts be made by hand?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's the thought that counts.", 3: '28'}
{2: 'Choosing a gift can be just as thoughtful.', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood. In that case, we need to hurry, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Alright, then let's...", 3: '33'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Before you can finish speaking, you hear a thunderous explosion behind you. Lucia pulls you behind her instinctively and grabs the hilt of her blade.'}
{3: 'You smell a sweet and greasy aroma in the air. People laugh jokingly at you two.'}
{3: 'Based on the calm crowd around you and the lack of fireworks, you realize it must be...'}
{3: 'Looking over, you see a black cylinder with a pressure gauge and various valves. Golden, puffy kernels fill the black cylinder, their sweet smell floating along the breeze.'}
{3: "You noticed the device earlier, but you didn't realize it was for making popcorn."}
{3: 'After paying with a few pieces of hardtack, the person operating the machine retrieves a tub of popcorn.'}
{3: 'Looks like you can make your own.'}
{3: "Lucia's eyes fix on the popcorn machine with the desire to give it a try."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This will be my gift to everyone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You can pay with this.', 3: '54'}
{3: "Constructs don't need to eat, so they rarely carry food or drinks. Fortunately, you grabbed some in case of emergency before departure."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I won't disappoint you this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: "...I'm looking forward to it."}
